changeSet.author: msantos
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE examxpert DROP FOREIGN KEY `genex_lab_fk`; ALTER TABLE `examxpert` CHANGE COLUMN `laboratory_ID` `laboratory_ID` INT(11) NULL ; ALTER TABLE `examxpert` ADD CONSTRAINT `genex_lab_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`laboratory_ID`) REFERENCES `laboratory` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE

changeSet.author: rmemoria
changeSet.sql: update examxpert set discriminator='gen' where discriminator is null

changeSet.author: rmemoria
rmemoria
changeSet.sql: insert into fieldvalue (field, name1, short_name1, workspace_id, other, enabled, displayOrder) select 43, 'Relapse', 'Relapse', id, 0, true, 1 from workspace where extension='ng';

insert into fieldvalue (field, name1, short_name1, workspace_id, other, enabled, displayOrder) select 43, 'Return after lost follow up', 'Return after lost follow up', id, 0, true, 2 from workspace where extension='ng';

insert into fieldvalue (field, name1, short_name1, workspace_id, other, enabled, displayOrder) select 43, 'Failed six month regimen', 'Failed six month regimen', id, 0, true, 3 from workspace where extension='ng';

insert into fieldvalue (field, name1, short_name1, workspace_id, other, enabled, displayOrder) select 43, 'Symptomatic contact of DR-TB cases', 'Symptomatic contact of DR-TB cases', id, 0, true, 4 from workspace where extension='ng';

insert into fieldvalue (field, name1, short_name1, workspace_id, other, enabled, displayOrder) select 43, 'PLHIV with symptoms of TB', 'PLHIV with symptoms of TB', id, 0, true, 5 from workspace where extension='ng';
insert into fieldvalue (field, name1, short_name1, workspace_id, other, enabled, displayOrder) select 43, 'EPTB', 'EPTB', id, 0, true, 6 from workspace where extension='ng';

insert into fieldvalue (field, name1, short_name1, workspace_id, other, enabled, displayOrder) select 43, 'Health workers with TB symptoms', 'Health workers with TB symptoms', id, 0, true, 7 from workspace where extension='ng';

insert into fieldvalue (field, name1, short_name1, workspace_id, other, enabled, displayOrder) select 43, 'Symptomatic presumptive TB cases with AFB result', 'Symptomatic presumptive TB cases with AFB result', id, 0, true, 8 from workspace where extension='ng';
insert into fieldvalue (field, name1, short_name1, workspace_id, other, enabled, displayOrder) select 43, 'Children', 'Children', id, 0, true, 9 from workspace where extension='ng';

insert into fieldvalue (field, name1, short_name1, workspace_id, other, enabled, displayOrder, otherDescription) select 43, 'Others', 'Others', id, 1, true, 10, 'Which?' from workspace where extension='ng';

changeSet.author: rmemoria
changeSet.sql: insert into fieldvalue (field, name1, short_name1, workspace_id, other, enabled, displayOrder) select 44, 'Health worker', 'Health worker', id, 0, true, 1 from workspace where extension='ng';

insert into fieldvalue (field, name1, short_name1, workspace_id, other, enabled, displayOrder, otherDescription) select 44, 'Treatment supporter', 'Treatment supporter', id, 1, true, 2, 'GSM number:' from workspace where extension='ng';

changeSet.author: rmemoria
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO `tag` (workspace_id, `tag_name`,`sqlcondition`,`consistencyCheck`,`active`,`dailyUpdate`,`displayOrder`,`summary`) select id, 'Presumptive without result','not exists(select * from exammicroscopy where case_id=a.id)\nand\nnot exists(select * from examxpert where case_id=a.id)',0,1,0,1,1 from workspace where extension='ng'

INSERT INTO `tag` (workspace_id, `tag_name`,`sqlcondition`,`consistencyCheck`,`active`,`dailyUpdate`,`displayOrder`,`summary`) select id, 'DS TB - All cases','a.classification=0 and diagnosisType=1',0,1,0,2,1 from workspace where extension='ng'

INSERT INTO `tag` (workspace_id, `tag_name`,`sqlcondition`,`consistencyCheck`,`active`,`dailyUpdate`,`displayOrder`,`summary`) select id, 'DR-TB on treatment','a.classification=1 and a.state in (1,2)',0,1,0,10,1 from workspace where extension='ng'

INSERT INTO `tag` (workspace_id, `tag_name`,`sqlcondition`,`consistencyCheck`,`active`,`dailyUpdate`,`displayOrder`,`summary`) select id, 'DR-TB without baseline culture','a.classification=1 and a.diagnosisType=1 \nand not exists(select * from examculture where case_id=a.id and dateCollected < a.initreatmentdate)',0,1,0,11,1 from workspace where extension='ng'

INSERT INTO `tag` (workspace_id, `tag_name`,`sqlcondition`,`consistencyCheck`,`active`,`dailyUpdate`,`displayOrder`,`summary`) select id,'TOTAL','a.classification in (0,1)',0,1,0,200,1 from workspace where extension='ng'
